title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?

Madrid

Zverev, Medvedev, Ruud advance, Rublev loses on Sunday

April 27, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Sunday, when Alexander Bublik upset defending champion Andrey Rublev. Alexander Zverev, Daniil Medvedev, Casper Ruud and Taylor Fritz were among those who advanced.

View all the Madrid results from Sunday below.

Results - Sunday, 27 April 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 32
ATP - [1] Alexander Zverev (GER) d [28] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) 26 76(3) 76(0)
ATP - [9] Daniil Medvedev d [Q] Juan Manuel Cerundolo (ARG) 62 62
ATP - [14] Casper Ruud (NOR) d [23] Sebastian Korda (USA) 63 63
ATP - Alexander Bublik (KAZ) d [7] Andrey Rublev 64 06 64
ATP - [22] Jakub Mensik (CZE) d [12] Ben Shelton (USA) 61 64
ATP - [31] Brandon Nakashima (USA) d Flavio Cobolli (ITA) 75 63
ATP - [3] Taylor Fritz Fritz (USA) d Benjamin Bonzi (FRA) 46 75 Retired
ATP - [20] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) d Francisco Comesana (ARG) 64 64

Men's Doubles - Round of 32
ATP - [5] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) d [Alt] Sander Arends (NED)/Luke Johnson (GBR) 64 62
ATP - Sander Gille (BEL)/Jan Zielinski (POL) d [Alt] Hendrik Jebens (GER)/Lucas Miedler (AUT) 67(5) 64 10-8
ATP - [6] Nikola Mektic (CRO)/Michael Venus (NZL) d Ariel Behar (URU)/Joran Vliegen (BEL) 75 36 10-7
ATP - Flavio Cobolli (ITA)/Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d Sadio Doumbia (FRA)/Fabien Reboul (FRA) 63 57 11-9
ATP - Tomas Machac (CZE)/Tommy Paul (USA) d [Alt] Gregoire Jacq (FRA)/Alexandre Muller (FRA) 61 63
ATP - Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA)/Albano Olivetti (FRA) d [WC] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP)/Frances Tiafoe (USA) 26 76(3) 10-5
